tool_description: Get TikTok Video data along with detailed information about Author, User Feed, Music .
name: TikTok Info
title: TikTok Info

api_list.name: getMusic
api_list.description: Get all the TikTok videos that are using a specific music along with the information about original music
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tiktok-info.p.rapidapi.com/music/6818239458366753542"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tiktok-info.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tiktok-info.p.rapidapi.com/music/{getmusic}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tiktok-info.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: getVideo
api_list.description: Get all the video information like Play URL, Cover, Stats, Codec along with Author and Music details

api_list.name: getUserVideos
api_list.description: Get all the videos of an user. By default the **limit** has been set to 10. You can customize it.
